3805671.title: [Improvement] Pull Request Review Improvements: Phase 1
3805671.description:
This PR introduces the first phase of improvements to the pull request review process for the office-start and OfficeHome repositories.

Key Enhancements:
- Streamlined review workflow for increased efficiency.
- Improved reviewer assignment logic.
- Enhanced feedback tracking for pull requests.

Expected Impact:
- Reduces review turnaround time by optimizing assignment.
- Provides better visibility into PR feedback history.
- Improves developer experience through structured review insights.

Testing:
- Conducted unit tests for automated review assignment.
- Validated feedback tracking in test environments.
- Gathered early feedback from internal teams.

3805672.title: [Feature] Create Pull Request for Work
3805672.description:
This PR ensures that all work is properly included in the GIT repository.

Key Additions:
- Implements automated checks to prevent missing changes.
- Enhances the pull request creation workflow.
- Ensures compliance with repository contribution guidelines.

Expected Impact:
- Reduces the risk of missing important changes.
- Improves collaboration by enforcing structured PR creation.
- Enhances repository integrity through automated validation.

Testing:
- Manual validation of PR creation workflow.
- Automated tests for missing work detection.
- Internal feedback collection from contributors.

3805673.title: [AutoTSG][Suggestion] PullRequestId Column Should Have Link to Pull Requests
3805673.description:
This PR adds hyperlinks to the PullRequestId column for improved navigation.

Key Enhancements:
- Introduces clickable links in the PullRequestId column.
- Enhances traceability between PRs and related issues.
- Improves user experience for navigating PR details.

Expected Impact:
- Reduces time spent searching for related PRs.
- Enhances usability for teams working with multiple PRs.
- Improves linkage between PR metadata and tracking systems.

Testing:
- UI tests for link rendering in different views.
- Validation of PR navigation through links.
- Feedback from stakeholders on usability improvements.

3805674.title: [Feature] Policy Tips in OWA (TSG for SE)
3805674.description:
This PR implements policy tips for Outlook on the Web (OWA) to enhance compliance and security measures.

Key Features:
- Introduces policy tip notifications in OWA.
- Provides real-time alerts for security and compliance violations.
- Enhances user awareness of company policies.

Expected Impact:
- Reduces policy violations through proactive notifications.
- Improves security awareness among OWA users.
- Enhances adherence to compliance guidelines.

Testing:
- End-to-end validation of policy tip triggers.
- Integration testing with OWA workflows.
- User feedback collection from internal pilot users.
